examples: I hate summer vacation.
The couple spent their vacation in a cozy cabin, billing and cooing by the fireplace.
My family goes on a vacation once a year.
To go on vacation.
We spent our vacation in a real heaven on earth.
words.defineEn: a span of time which we do not work or go to school, and spend traveling or resting instead, particularly in a different city, country, etc.
words.defineVi: một khoảng thời gian mà chúng ta không đi làm hay đi học mà thay vào đó là đi du lịch hoặc nghỉ ngơi, đặc biệt là ở một thành phố, quốc gia khác, v.v.

examples: We should fill the bathtub with warm water for a relaxing bath.
My sister used to take a relaxing bath or shower before going to bed at night.
Costa Rica sounds like a great place for a relaxing vacation.
She sprinkled dried alkanet petals in her bathwater, turning it into a relaxing and visually appealing soak.
That was just so relaxing for me.
words.defineEn: helping our body or mind rest
words.defineVi: giúp cơ thể hoặc tâm trí của chúng tôi nghỉ ngơi

examples: Holy moly, this is exciting news!
The company CEO let the employees in on the exciting news about the upcoming merger.
Hockey is an exciting sport played on ice or field, with sticks and a small puck or ball.
Take the initiative and fill your life with exciting experiences.
They claim drag racing is the most exciting motor sport.
words.defineEn: making us feel interested, happy, and energetic
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy thích thú, hạnh phúc và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: You raise some interesting points.
We had a very interesting discussion about climate change.
It's an interesting proposal.
All of them had an interesting story to tell.
The game's premise and mechanics are interesting, but there's just no meat on the bone when it comes to story and gameplay variety.
words.defineEn: catching and keeping our attention because of being unusual, exciting, etc.
words.defineVi: thu hút và giữ sự chú ý của chúng tôi vì khác thường, thú vị, v.v.

examples: When Sarah's friends teased her about her unusual tastes in music and art, she reminded them that every Jack has his Jill, and she would eventually find someone who appreciated her interests.
The person may have unusual mannerisms.
Lamborghini situation is not unusual.
Kathy's situation is not unusual.
Was that unusual?
words.defineVi: không thường xảy ra hoặc thực hiện

examples: The match was awesome.
That part was awesome.
The captions were awesome.
Prokaryotes are awesome!
These people are awesome.
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tốt và tuyệt vời

examples: The purple flowers in the vase were beautiful.
My mom planted beautiful flowers in the front yard.
It's beautiful!
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
The vibrant purple color of whinberries adds a beautiful touch to desserts like cheesecakes and tarts.
words.defineEn: extremely pleasing to the mind or senses
words.defineVi: cực kỳ dễ chịu cho tâm trí hoặc các giác quan

examples: The movie was as boring as they come.
It’s so boring, eating the same food day in, day out.
I have to do the same boring jobs day in day out.
The child nodded off to sleep during the boring lecture.
This course seemed right up my alley when I signed up for it, but it ended up being dreadfully boring.
words.defineEn: making us feel tired and unsatisfied because of not being interesting
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy mệt mỏi và không hài lòng vì không thú vị

examples: The open window let in a cool breeze.
I dipped my feet in the cool water of the river.
I'd give my right arm for a nice cool drink.
She pressed her cheek against the cool glass window.
He completely lost his cool and started yelling.
words.defineEn: having a temperature that is low but not cold, especially in a way that is enjoyable and pleasant
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ thấp nhưng không lạnh, đặc biệt là theo cách thú vị và dễ chịu

examples: The California vineyards produce excellent wines.
Camembert is an excellent choice for a picnic.
She would have made an excellent teacher.
Liz Quinn was considered an excellent teacher.
Regular investment of small amounts of money is an excellent way of building a nest egg.
words.defineEn: extremely good in quality or other traits
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tốt về chất lượng hoặc các đặc điểm khác

examples: This store is famous for its bait and switch tactics.
The famous author made a mint from royalties on his best-selling books.
The Black Forest in Germany is famous for its beautiful scenery and delicious cake.
I saw a famous actress at the shopping mall today.
My sister's famous sweet cherry jam is a family favorite.
words.defineEn: known by a lot of people

examples: Danish Blue cheese is fantastic in vegetarian dishes.
The vibrant hue of damson makes it a fantastic ingredient for homemade fruit popsicles.
Take time by the forelock and accept that fantastic internship!
She told me that yeast extract is a fantastic seasoning substitute for reducing sodium in my meals.
All my friends agree that Gruyère is a fantastic melting cheese.
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: Your presentation sounded great, honestly.
The finance minister's fall from grace gave his enemies great satisfaction.
To show great courage.
The pope himself had taken great umbrage at the book.
The baby has brought them great joy.
words.defineEn: worthy of being approved or admired
words.defineVi: xứng đáng được chấp thuận hoặc ngưỡng mộ

examples: Whales are incredible marine animals that migrate long distances.
Facing elimination from the playoffs, the team's star quarterback threw an incredible pass for a last-minute touchdown and saved the situation.
The factory produces an incredible 100 cars per hour.
The magician knew how to blow the audience's doors off with his incredible illusions and tricks.
These kits are incredible.
The garden looks nice.
The soft carpet feels nice under my feet.
The children were nice as pie.
This room would make a nice office.
The spicy sausage and mushroom fusilli had a nice kick of flavor.
words.defineVi: cung cấp niềm vui và hưởng thụ

examples: A cup of tea sounds perfect.
The combination of the meatloaf, mashed potatoes, and greens was perfect.
The orange pumpkin was perfect for Halloween.
Good afternoon, the weather is perfect for a walk.
The refreshing Muscat grape juice was the perfect choice for a hot summer day.
words.defineEn: being as great, complete, and flawless as possible
words.defineVi: tuyệt vời, đầy đủ và hoàn hảo nhất có thể

examples: The hiker enjoyed the scenic beauty of the river's gentle bends.
The Rhine River is one of the longest rivers in Germany and offers scenic boat cruises.
We went on a road trip and explored the scenic beauty of the country.
Whether you take the scenic route or the highway, it makes no odds to the length of the journey.
Families in the scenic park enjoyed picnic sandwiches with thinly sliced picnic shoulder and fresh toppings.
words.defineEn: having a very beautiful view of nature
words.defineVi: có một cái nhìn rất đẹp về thiên nhiên

examples: The atmosphere was terrific.
"Trees are terrific!"
Their theories had a terrific run.
That sounds terrific.
You're terrific.
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful
Doesn’t Rosie look wonderful?
Squash adds a wonderful texture and sweetness to curries.
Since the news broke I've received thousands of wonderful letters.
To my eye, Jake, you're the most wonderful man on the planet.
words.defineVi: rất tuyệt vời và dễ chịu
